title.rendered: RHINO 4X4 ROCK SLIDERS SUIT NISSAN PATROL Y62

content.rendered:
The Rhino 4×4 rock sliders are:

• Made with 3mm wall thickness mild steel

• Bolted directly to your chassis

• Bolted with a 6mm laser-cut folded plate and high tensile zinc plated bolts

• Finished with a hard-wearing flat black powder coat

• Practically designed with the Rhino 4X4 mix of tough and subtle styling

No vehicle modifications or welding is required to install our sliders. They protrude just enough to be used as a step. Their main purpose is vehicle protection, with the added benefit of making your Patrol look tough.

Includes:

• Left and right rock sliders

• Powder coated flat black for durability

• Two high lift jacking points

• Full bolt kit including heavy duty 6mm brackets
